title: Mall Tycoon 3 Pc
description:
Mall Tycoon 3 Pc game, 
works fine (please leave comment if not)don&#039;t know wether you have to burn the files on a disk but these files are copied right from the original cd.

System requirements:
Windows 98/2000/xp
Pentium 3 800mhz or hihger
128 mb ram
750 mb free hard disk space
directX 9.0 compatible 3d video card with 32 mb ram (64mb recommended)
DirectX 9.0 compatible sound 

How to:
1. download
2. unzip
3. burn unzipped files on a cd
4. double click setup.exe and select language
5. when finished installing click autorun.exe and you can play
